title: The counter scuffle Whereunto is added The counter rat. Written by R.S.
author: R. S. (Robert Speed)
publisher: printed by R.B. and are to be sold by Iohn Stafford,
notes: Ascribed to Robert Speed.  Cf. BM, Halkett & Laing, Allibone.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
